title: 75/153/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 February 1975 on the reform of agricultural structures in Ireland in implementation of Directive No 72/161/EEC (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 25 February 1975  on the reform of agricultural structures in Ireland in implementation of Directive No 72/161/EEC  (Only the English text is authentic)  (75/153/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Scheme of Vocational Training for Persons engaged in Agriculture as notified by the Government of Ireland satisfies the conditions for financial contribution from the Community to common measures as referred to in Article 8 of Directive No 72/161/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 February 1975.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 15.
